25E60486.VoiceDir25.BAE4: Determined--no way the player is going to side with Lilith.

2C65B36C.Line27.BD31C: Then this is the future that awaits you.

5E8846E6.Line21.BD31C: Simply take my hand. Fight for Sanctuary.

B6DC9E59.Line25.BAE4: I will never take your hand.

DA18580D.Line19.BD31C: Hatred, Destruction, and Terror are forever; we will always need to fight them. But we can turn the tide of the Eternal Conflict in our favor. It starts here, with Mephisto's destruction--and you will lead the battles to come.

F87CC068.Line23.BD31C: I will stay in the shadows.
